fields.name: ContentId
fields.description: Id of the content item we depend on

fields.name: Criteria
fields.description: This is the list of dependencies we must fulfill, according to the AND/OR operator

fields.name: Kind
fields.description: Type of the content item we depend on

fields.name: Operator
fields.description: Operator used for list of dependencies in criteria array.

fields.name: Version
fields.description: Version of the the content item we depend on.  Can be blank, * or missing to indicate any version fulfills the dependency.  If version does not match our defined numeric format then an exact match is required.
